code: import"../App.css";import Knob from"react-simple-knob";import{jsx as _jsx}from"react/jsx-runtime";import{jsxs as _jsxs}from"react/jsx-runtime";var knobStyle={margin:"0 auto",height:"5rem",fontFamily:"Arial",color:"#26547cff"};var Master=function Master(_ref){var setFilter=_ref.setFilter,setVolume=_ref.setVolume,setDist=_ref.setDist,setRev=_ref.setRev,setBpm=_ref.setBpm,start=_ref.start,stop=_ref.stop,isPlaying=_ref.isPlaying;return/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"master-control",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("span",{children:"Master control section"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("hr",{}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("button",{className:isPlaying?"play--active":"play",onClick:start}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("button",{className:isPlaying?"stop":"stop--active",onClick:stop}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"master-knobs",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(Knob,{name:"Volume",unit:"",defaultPercentage:0.5,onChange:setVolume,bg:"black",fg:"white",mouseSpeed:1,transform:function transform(p){return parseInt(p*50,10)/50;},style:knobStyle}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(Knob,{name:"BPM",unit:"",defaultPercentage:0.4,onChange:setBpm,bg:"black",fg:"white",mouseSpeed:1,transform:function transform(p){return parseInt(p*300);},style:knobStyle}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(Knob,{name:"Drive",unit:"",defaultPercentage:0,onChange:setDist,bg:"black",fg:"white",mouseSpeed:1,transform:function transform(p){return parseInt(p*50,10)/50;},style:knobStyle}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(Knob,{name:"Reverb",unit:"",defaultPercentage:0,onChange:setRev,bg:"black",fg:"white",mouseSpeed:1,transform:function transform(p){return parseInt(p*50,10)/10;},style:knobStyle}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(Knob,{name:"Filter",unit:"",defaultPercentage:0,onChange:setFilter,bg:"black",fg:"white",mouseSpeed:1,transform:function transform(p){return parseInt(p*20,10);},style:knobStyle})]})]});};export default Master;
